question: Is it permissble to shave chest hairs for males? as it is now common these days.
answer:
QUESTION

Is it permissble to shave chest hairs for males? as it is now common these days.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

It is permissible for males to shave the hair of the chest; however it is undesirable to do so.

 

ولا باس في حلق شعر الصدر والظهر

(Raddul Muhtaar V6 Pg 407 Saeed Company)  (Bahishti Zewar Pg 830)

 

And Allah knows best

Wassalam
